medical_records_request.title: Your Medical Record
medical_records_request.subtitle: Download your health records, or share them with your medical care providers.
medical_records_request.select_time_header: 1. Select Time Period for your Health Record
medical_records_request.select_what_to_do: 2. Choose what you would like to do with your health information
medical_records_request.download_info: Download zip file containing PDF and XML file formats.
medical_records_request.email_info: Your health information will be sent to the email address below.
medical_records_request.confirm_email_error: Email and confirm email fields do not match.
medical_records_request.file_not_found: File not found, file might have been deleted due to timeout. If you still need these documents, please request medical records again!
medical_records_request.download_disclaimer: You are about to download HIPAA Protect Sensitive Patient Health Information outside of our secure system. Once document(s) are downloaded the action can not be canceled. By downloading this document(s), you understand and acknowledge that you are solely responsible for the confidentiality and security of information you are downloading out of our secure network.
medical_records_request.download_warning: Warning: Do not download this file if you are using a public computer.
medical_records_request.email_disclaimer:
You are about to transmit HIPAA Protect Sensitive Patient Health Information outside of our secure system. Please ensure the recipient's email address is accurate before sending. Once sent, the email cannot be recovered or cancelled. By sending this email, you understand and acknowledge that you are solely responsible for the confidentiality and security of information you transmit out of our secure system. 
Your health information will be sent via standard, unencrypted email.
medical_records_request.close_window_description: Your Medical History was successfully downloaded. If you have completed your request, please close this form.
medical_records_request.close_window_description_third_party: Medical History was successfully downloaded. Please close this form.
medical_records_request.close_window_after_sent_description: Your Medical History is sent successfully. If you have completed your request, please close this form.
medical_records_request.close_window_share:
Your medical records have been sent to the following email address: <0>{{emailAddress}}</0>
Please close this window.
medical_records_request.disable_popups: Please disable your pop-up blocker to preview medical records

download_medical_records.title: Download medical records
download_medical_records.verify_desc: Please verify medical record owner identity to proceed
download_medical_records.disclaimer:
Warning: 
You are about to download HIPAA Protect Sensitive Patient Health Information and they should be protected as such.
download_medical_records.disclaimer_bullet_1: Make sure you access this information from a secure network
download_medical_records.disclaimer_bullet_2: Do not forward this email or share this link with anyone

If you have issues with this download or your link is expired, DO NOT REPLY TO THIS EMAIL.

lab_results.title: Your recent test results.
lab_results.paragraph_1: Click on the individual test result to see additional information.
lab_results.paragraph_2: These results are being released as soon as they are reviewed by your provider. Please allow your provider up to 3 business days to review. If several tests were ordered, your provider may wait to comment until all results are complete.
lab_results.paragraph_3: A test result listed as “abnormal” may be normal for you.
lab_results.paragraph_4: Your provider will contact you about any important abnormal test results.
lab_results.send_a_message_title: Have a question about your tests?
lab_results.any_questions: If you have any questions regarding your results, please message your provider’s office and we will reply within 24 hours.
lab_results.no_observations: No observations included in lab result
lab_results.note_paragraph_1: A test result listed as “abnormal” may be normal for you.
lab_results.note_paragraph_2: Your provider will contact you about any important abnormal test results.
lab_results.lab_results_image_error: Could not load page {{pageNumber}} for this lab result.
lab_results.error: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot retrieve your results at the moment. Please call our office during business hours and we will assist you or try again later.
lab_results.message_error: Sending message failed. Please try again.
lab_results.lab_results_download_success: Lab result successfully downloaded to your device.

feedbacks.title: Please rate your recent experience with CWC.
feedbacks.paragraph_1: Thinking about your interaction you had with CWC how satisfied are you with the experience?
feedbacks.paragraph_2: What is the single most important thing that caused you to give the employee this rating?
feedbacks.warning: Please do not include sensitive information such as your medical history information, user name or password in your response. The security and confidentiality of your information is important to us.
feedbacks.result_title: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.
feedbacks.result_paragraph_1: Thank you for taking time to share your feedback with us. We strive to provide the best patient experience and we value your feedback.
feedbacks.result_paragraph_2: Would you give us feedback on
feedbacks.result_paragraph_3: and help us spread the word?

cancellation_reason.title: Appointment Cancelation Settings
cancellation_reason.description:
Map and configure EHR/EMR appointment cancelation types to how they will appear to patients.

If voice bot can not recognize the reason for canceling or rescheduling an appointment, chose default options on how they should be entered/mapped in the EMR/EHR system.
